testCaseName: Complete E-commerce Testing - Cart Management & Order Management
testCaseDescription: Comprehensive test suite covering shopping cart workflow and order management: Cart operations (guest & logged-in)  Order creation & validation  Order tracking & management

expectedResults.TCCart01: Sn phm c thm vo gi hng thnh cng khi cha ng nhp, modal hin th thng bo thnh cng
expectedResults.TCLogin01: ng nhp thnh cng vi thng tin hp l, chuyn v trang ch vi trng thi  ng nhp
expectedResults.TCCart02: Sn phm c thm vo gi hng sau khi ng nhp, gi nguyn sn phm  thm trc
expectedResults.TCCart03: S lng sn phm trong gi tng ln khi thm cng sn phm nhiu ln
expectedResults.TCCart04: Nhiu sn phm khc nhau c thm vo gi hng thnh cng, hin th y  trong gi
expectedResults.TCCart05: H thng hin th thng bo li hoc khng cho php thm sn phm khi s lng khng hp l (0)
expectedResults.TCCart06: Trang gi hng hin th y  cc sn phm  thm vi thng tin chi tit (tn, gi, s lng)
expectedResults.TCCart07: S lng sn phm c cp nht thnh cng khi tng/gim, tng tin thay i tng ng
expectedResults.TCCart08: Sn phm c xa khi gi hng thnh cng, gi hng cp nht ngay lp tc
expectedResults.TCOrder01: n hng c to thnh cng vi y  thng tin: a ch giao hng, phng thc vn chuyn, thanh ton
expectedResults.TCOrder02: H thng hin th thng bo li validation khi thiu thng tin bt buc (s in thoi), khng cho php lu a ch
expectedResults.TCOrder03: H thng hin th thng bo li khi cha ng  iu khon, khng cho php hon tt n hng
expectedResults.TCOrder04: Danh sch n hng hin th y  vi thng tin: m n, ngy to, tng tin, trng thi thanh ton
expectedResults.TCOrder05: Chi tit n hng hin th y : thng tin sn phm, a ch giao hng, ph vn chuyn, tng tin
expectedResults.TCOrder06: File ha n (invoice) c ti xung thnh cng  nh dng PDF hoc tng t
expectedResults.TCOrder07: n hng c hy thnh cng, trng thi n hng cp nht thnh 'Cancelled' hoc b xa khi danh sch

notes: Test case ny kim tra ton b lung t guest user n logged-in user
Cn verify rng sn phm c thm khi cha login vn cn sau khi login
Kim tra validation cho s lng sn phm khng hp l
Kim tra chc nng xem, cp nht v xa sn phm trong gi hng
Verify tng tin cp nht chnh xc khi thay i s lng
Kim tra quy trnh to n hng t A-Z vi validation y
Test cc trng hp li: thiu d liu, khng ng  iu khon
Verify chc nng qun l n hng: xem danh sch, chi tit, ti ha n, hy n

Newest.name: Newest - Sp xp sn phm theo Newest

events.javaScript: let add = false; let x = typeof $ !== 'undefined' ? $('[name="sort_by"]')[0] : document.querySelector('[name="sort_by"]'); for (i = 0; i < x.options.length; i++) { if (x.options[i].text === "Newest") { if(add) { x.options[i].selected = true; } else { x.options.selectedIndex = i; } } }
